about_the_game:
‘Listen Me’ is a 4-players cooperative online puzzle game.
In ‘Listen Me’ everyone must work together and solve all puzzles to win the prize for restarting their life, but solving puzzles isn’t easy there is times and mistakes limit. Communicating is the core of this game, 1 player will be given the role of Operator who will be observing and helping 3 other players. Those players will be in their separate rooms.
So, let’s communicate, solve all puzzles, and get the prize!

Story


Listen Me Company is currently recruiting testers! You got tricked into applying for outrageously high pay without knowing what being a tester entails. Will you be able to overcome the obstacles and earn the reward, or will you fail as a group? Everything depends on your intelligence and teamwork!

Join forces with your teammates to solve the mystery and move on to the next room. Come on, the prize money is waiting for you!

Feature


Online Multiplayer
In this game, all players must work together to solve the puzzle. If anyone loses, everyone loses.

Voice Chat
We have Voice Chat system for players to communicate and exchange their thought for the best experience possible.

Challenging Experience
There are some obstacles, in every puzzle your time limit will get reduced if you and your team not doing anything to the obstacle. But! If any puzzle gets solved you will get extra time! We also have an optional mini game, if you play it you’ll get extra time. So please manage your time properly!

Ranking
All ranks in this game have the same condition. You’ll get a rank from clearing the game in each round. Getting a high rank isn’t an easy task, it relies on everyone. Let’s try solving puzzles and clear the game as fast as possible!

name: Listen Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 460 (2 GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (4 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 570 (4 GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Listen Me is a co-op puzzle game for 4 players. Lured in by immense compensation, you must work with fellow testers to solve the puzzles. Each tester is separated into different rooms. Communication is the key to leading you to figure out the clues and get that paycheck!
